sections.title: Bash Tools
sections.description: Here you'll find some handy bash-related tools for Windows.

sections.title: Windows Network Reset
sections.description: To quickly reset your network settings on Windows, run the following command in PowerShell as Administrator (Just in case)
sections.instruction: If the command above doesn't work directly, you can download and run the script manually from the link below:
sections.warning: If Windows warns that this file isn't commonly downloaded, that is just a standard security warning for scripts from the internet. You can safely proceed by right-clicking the downloaded file and selecting "Keep" (or a similar option).

sections.title: Get System Information
sections.description: To get your system specs, organized nicely, run this with PowerShell as Administrator (Just in case)
sections.instruction: If the command above doesn't work directly, you can download and run the script manually from the link below:

sections.title: Password Generator
sections.description: Generate a secure password, run this with PowerShell as Administrator (Just in case)
sections.instruction: You can also add ?length=SomeNumber to set password length.
sections.warning: If Windows warns that this file isn't commonly downloaded, that is just a standard security warning for scripts from the internet.
